title: 【十字梦の搬运】神之重生点（The God Spawner）
author: 银色十字梦
txt_content:
大家好~我是十字梦~
这次带来的是【神之重生点（The God Spawner）】我承认这个译名不大好听，但是用其他译名的话貌似也不太好OWO
也是奇幻风格的巨作，是类似于主城之类的建筑，喜欢的服主可以拿去做主城地图。

嘛，图片就是这样OWO
作者的话
I began playing Minecraft in July of 2011. From that point onwards I have attempted to progress my creative skills and really enjoy what this game has to offer. In January 2012 I created my PMC account and that's also where I noticed the Angel Block Society! A huge achievement of mine has been to join this elite group and advance my building skills as much as possible. I have tried and failed on several occasions to become a member of the esteemed society. Today, I would like to present my new application for the group and it is something which I have put a lot of effort (my heart and soul) into. I hope you enjoy the build as much as I enjoyed creating it. Thankyou - RamboSmile 
我的渣翻
我在2011年七月开始玩MC。从那时起我一直在尝试提高我的建筑技巧。2012年1月，我创建了我的PMC账号，也是在那里，我看到了【天使建筑团队】。我的一个巨大的成就促使我加入了这个精英建筑团队并且尽可能的提升我的建筑水平。
